SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am40
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am40.server.network.RMI

Interface RemoteInterfaceServer

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteObjectServer
public interface RemoteInterfaceServer extends Remote
Interface RemoteInterfaceServer is used by the client to call methods on the server (RMI). These methods are "callable" in the network.

  • Method Details

    • example

      @Deprecated String example() throws RemoteException
      Deprecated.
      Example method for RMI debugging
      Returns:
      a "hello" string
      Throws:
      RemoteException - (standard RMI calls exception)

    • registerClient

      Integer registerClient(RemoteInterfaceClient client, String hostname) throws RemoteException
      Method to register a new orphan client on the server with RMI
      Parameters:
      client - the remote interface of this client
      Returns:
      the clientID of the new network client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - (standard RMI calls exception)

    • unregisterClient

      void unregisterClient(Integer clientID) throws RemoteException
      Method to unregister a client from the server with RMI
      Parameters:
      clientID - the clientID of the client to unregister
      Throws:
      RemoteException - (standard RMI calls exception)
